Description:
Crossing the desert sands you arrive at a camp located at the foot of a large altar.

The drifting of the sands in the faint breeze sounds almost like prophetic voices foretelling a distant doom - a doom that feels awfully familiar, after your experiences at the last altar.
DescriptionAction: The rasping voices urge you to to place the Whispering Stone atop this altar.
